author: struberg
msg: OWB-1072 provide "CDI Conversation Filter" which is required by the spec.
This is a pure Filter impl. It does _not_ scan web.xml nor does it provide the mapping.
This is up to the EE integration to do so. It just provides a Filter which eagerly
'attaches' the Conversation to the current request.

msg: LUCENE-6045 - refactored BPC constructor to be more consistent with others

author: tilman
msg: PDFBOX-2792, PDFBOX-2793: fix regression from rev 1634252 - PDPageDestination.getPageNumber() returns zero-based result, so don't substract 1 when passing result to PDDocument.getPage()
